principal_title: The new era of chess built in Vara Network
principal_subtitle: Dive into one of the most exciting games of all time.
second_section_title_element_1: Bet and win your VARA tokens
second_section_subtitle_element_1: Play with your friends and inmerse yourself in the adventure of chess.
second_section_subtitle_element_2: With VaraChess, every victory and achivement translates into Vara tokens that you can accumulate and use within our ecosystem.
second_section_subtitle_element_3: Put your VARA tokens in staking and get benefits for keeping them locked and you will be able to use tokens on our platform.
second_section_subtitle_element_4: Enjoy a cutting-edge, adaptative design that inmerses you in the game and keeps you playing for hours.
